subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: General Manager Omar Minaya strongly hinted that he would like to bring back Willie Randolph for a fourth season as the Mets’ manager despite the disastrous end to the 2007 campaign.
snippet: General Manager Omar Minaya strongly hinted that he would like to bring back Willie Randolph for a fourth season as the Mets’ manager despite the disastrous end to the 2007 campaign.
